SpellDef.Description:
Converts 100 Horses into a random amount of Gildar (Min: 300, Max: 600)
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] SELL HORSES (-100 HORSES) ::: Converts 100 Horses into a random amount of Gildar (Min: 300, Max: 600)
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Self
EFFECT ::: - 100 Horses ::: + [300,600] Gildar
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Instant
OTHER ::: Caster must be Sov ::: Player Only
SOURCE ::: All
